title: Ginny D
tagline: Beautifully made bespoke ecommerce website for a jewellery designer.
features: Automated order and gift voucher email notifications
content1: Ginny is a bespoke jewellery maker who used to sell jewellery on the markets across the country. However, due to the COVID-19 government restrictions, she decided to move her business online.
content2: The new website needed to reflect her brand - expensive feeling and high quality. We decided to design a website that is minimalist and focuses on Ginny's products, but in the meantime is easy to use and takes the advantage of simple, but effective, cross-selling features to maximise revenue. As a result, over 10 orders have been placed on the lauch day!
